Text.val: 10.07.2013 GB SCR18261 Added call the OID748B
08.03.2013 GB SCR17995 Replaced screen button load logic by GB901
21.12.2012 GB SCR17810 Extended selection for the distinct HUSR_ID
04.04.2012 SH SCR17182 Replaced GM900 by GB900 (program permission)
17.01.2012 SH SCR17035 OK handling: Added test on HUSR_HOFF_CODE = HUSR_HOFF_CODE of current user
-- Checkbox OK / Button OK / Button All OK
-- Further ELIH varibales, not presented on screen
-- Message: No authorization (presented outside transcation to avoid locks)
... not displayed if button All OK is pressed
-- Approval lawyer invoices (initiation of the second approval)
-- no authorization (message is presented outside current transaction, no
message if button All OK was pressed)
-- Call BID478 in G.S. of ELIH_NO, to enable proper handling within BID478
regarding ELIH_STATUS tests/updates, so after the final update of ELIH_STATUS.
This is only necessary if BID478 is not submitted (so only for testing purposes)
-- no authorization (message is presented outside current transaction, no
message if button All OK was pressed)

SQL_STMT_U.val: select HUSR_ID from :1/HUSR join :1/AUTH on AUTH_TYPE = 10 and AUTH_AMOUNTADVANCE >= :2 where HUSR_ID <> ':3' and (HUSR_DEPARTMENTROLE = AUTH_DEPARTMENTROLE1 and AUTH_DEPARTMENTROLE2 = :5 or HUSR_DEPARTMENTROLE = AUTH_DEPARTMENTROLE2 and AUTH_DEPARTMENTROLE1 = :5) and HUSR_HOFF_CODE = ':4' group by HUSR_ID for fetch only
